content.rendered:
Photo by Blake Wisz on Unsplash

Grab your coffee (or brew of choice) and join me as I walk you through the latest themes, tutorials and two new podcasts from the Genesis community.

Themes

ZigZagPress launch their 37th Genesis theme, Dulcis, ‘a clean and minimalist magazine theme best for fashion and lifestyle blogger[s]’.

Announcing our 37th #genesiswp theme: Dulcis
Help us celebrate with 40% off all themes and theme packages!https://t.co/UIsudpHio2

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) June 27, 2017

Sridhar Katakam starts a new functionality themes project.

Functionality Themes:https://t.co/rv8DpUSvPA#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 26, 2017

Fresh off the release of his latest theme FreelancePro last week, Matt Whiteley is already working on his next Genesis theme, Dine Pro.

#wordpress #genesiswp child theme #3 is underway! DinePro will be a restaurant theme with a sweet, easy to use #acf menu system. Stay tuned! pic.twitter.com/2clm4swf5n

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) June 28, 2017

It sounds like Lindsey Riel over at Pretty Darn Cute is launching a new theme entitled Travel Pretty (h/t Susan Ramsey).

I can't wait for Lindsey to release #TravelPretty – I've had a sneak peak, and it's gorgeous! #TravelBlogger #GenesisWP #WordPress #blogging pic.twitter.com/pP7b87YBZ7

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) July 2, 2017

Podcasts

Carrie Dils speaks to Chris Lema about the recent WooCommerce pricing changes on OfficeHours.fm.

Thanks @officehoursfm and @chrislema for this nuanced podcast on the Woo renewal pricing change: https://t.co/xfRKt3qIeT

— Ines van Essen (@themotherofcode) June 29, 2017

Jackie D’Elia is back with the latest edition of Rethink.fm and this week her guest is, err, me! I chat a little bit about GenesisWP.guide, my latest thoughts on workflow, and why none of us know everything (and why that’s OK).

Got to chat with everyone's favorite #genesiswp curator on @rethinkfm – @iamnickdavis is a super smart guy and shared some workflow wisdom. https://t.co/IujQwFI3oJ

— Jackie D'Elia (@jdelia) June 30, 2017

Best of the rest

Jesse Petersen, creator of GenesisThe.me and all round Genesis rockstar, is giving an 10% off all his products during his medical leave (or if you feel like helping out you can also add 10% to the cart total too).

If you’re not familar with Jesse’s story check out his website newlungsfor.me.

Indefinite 10% off Pricing for Medical Leave https://t.co/rqiiGNJFSV — NEWLUNGS10

OR NEWLUNGSGIVE10 to add 10% to cart total. #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/0fT9OivJZy

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) June 28, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to unlink the homepage logo in Genesis.

How to unlink logo on the homepage in Genesis:https://t.co/9HLzutPuzg#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 27, 2017

Plus, how to overlay post titles on featured images on single posts in Ambiance Pro.

How to overlay Post titles on featured images on single posts in Ambiance Pro:https://t.co/9RZvIfiIYn#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/jyaSWZGLAc

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 28, 2017

BobWP shows you how to make your category archive page stand out.

Make Your Category Archive Page Stand Out with Your Genesis Child Theme https://t.co/JYSEIIXf2P #WordPress #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/hyH4Cq1lB1

— BobWP (@bobWP) June 27, 2017

Matt Whiteley teaches you to create a simple support ticket system with Gravity Forms and Advanced Custom Fields.

Latest Post: Create a Simple Support Ticket System with #gravityforms and #acf is live! #wordpress #genesiswphttps://t.co/mNcXNq16ji

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) June 26, 2017

Carrie Dils shares a few lead generation tactics.

Latest from the blog-> Freelancing Fundamentals: Lead Generation Tactics https://t.co/LUDJCxiM2k

— carrie dils (@cdils) June 30, 2017

excerpt.rendered: A new theme from ZigZagPress, a new theme project from Sridhar Katakam, plus two new podcasts from the community.
